game.name: It Takes Two Friend's Pass
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support
game.shortDescription: 친구 패스*를 다운로드하면 It Takes Two를 친구와 무료로 플레이할 수 있습니다! 정식 게임을 소유한 친구를 통해 무료로 친구 패스를 다운로드하고 함께 플레이하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Download Friend's Pass* and play It Takes Two with a friend for free. Just grab a friend who owns the full game, download Friend's Pass for free, and play together!

reviewHighlights.text: 100% recommend. Especially if you're in a relationship. Might even fix things. The perspectives feel a little too real to how I can be irl. Sometimes...
An extremely great game but it also depends on who did you play with This game really need great teamwork and also be co-operative and not being compe...
